ValidationRule.description: This rule requires that contract information be entered before moving to the Approved or Signed Stages
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
OR(
And( ISPICKVAL(Loan_Type__c, "Fixed Daily [ACH Loan]"), OR ( ISBLANK(Specified_Percentage__c), ISBLANK(ACH_Program_Fee__c ), ISBLANK( Number_of_Payments__c )) ),
And( ISPICKVAL(Loan_Type__c, "Holdback [MCA]"), ISBLANK( Daily_Holdback_Amount__c))
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If Loan Type is Fixed Daily [ACH Loan], Number of Payments, Specified Percentage and ACH Program Fee are required. If Loan Type is MCA, Daily Holdback % is required.
